name: My Last Friday Demo
description: “It will be over soon, I promise.” Definitely not the most encouraging words from someone who is about to lock you inside a bathroom of an abandoned house. Howard must escape but it won’t be easy because the world around him is nothing like what it used to be. His journey will lead him through bizarre disturbing places filled with gruesome creatures and weird characters. As he starts to uncover his role in this story it becomes more clear that leaving behind this living nightmare will be even harder than it originally seemed.
